ehe­yin sithehi sansun sama­diya raka­gana manase ya yuthuya yana gamana nisi lesa athara maga nowa­nata winasekuma­ra­ka­ttuwe ke.di. aari­ya­dasa  oya gaha­ni­gen apa­hata kisi wada­k natha kimata game kene­kuta yami ida­k natha goma riti polawe nidi­yapu redi kada­k matha pagena mini­su­nata heluwa ada­k netha aada sitama mage yuthu­kam itu­ ke­ruwa thibu sami­thi­yak athnam nila­tha­la­ da­ruwa kos del kehe­lmuwa maluwe rasa­ i­ruwa nathi bari un samanga diwi­yata mula­ pi­ruwa illu uda­wwak athnam noka­ra ­bari itu­kara dunimi hama­tama ee koho­ma­ hari suma­gata yawa­nnata daru­wan duni­mi ­diri maෙga awa­san gamana ya haka sathu­ta ­pirihiri­ku­luwe tiyula aari­ya­wathikandu bun pili­ma­yaka pa sanga­la­k ba­kala daknata labe maru katha­rak mada­ ni­sala kada­tholu muhu­nu­thada ohu sathu wunu ­wi­rala wahari athi mahima!
